import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get asset valuation"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/{assetId}/valuation"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves depreciation and valuation data for a specific asset, including useful life, replacement cost, salvage value, and period-based depreciation schedule entries used in lifecycle reporting. Use this endpoint when building cost dashboards, exporting valuation data, or validating asset financial assumptions for a single device.

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/list-all-assets) or [POST /api/v1.0/assets/search](/docs/api/assets/keyword-search-assets) to locate the asset and extract `Items[].AssetId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Find the asset: [GET /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/list-all-assets) or [POST /api/v1.0/assets/search](/docs/api/assets/keyword-search-assets) -&gt; extract `Items[].AssetId`.
2. Retrieve valuation: [GET /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}/valuation](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-valuation).

**Minimal Required Fields**: assetId (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the asset","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Valuation data retrieved successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response containing asset valuation data","properties":{"Item":{"type":"object","description":"Valuation metrics for the asset","properties":{"AssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","nullable":true},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true},"UsefulLifeInMonths":{"type":"integer","nullable":true},"UsefulLifeInYears":{"type":"integer","nullable":true},"ReplacementCost":{"type":"number","nullable":true},"SalvageValue":{"type":"number","nullable":true},"EndOfLifeDate":{"type":"string","format":"date","nullable":true},"CurrentValue":{"type":"number","nullable":true},"NumberOfPeriods":{"type":"integer","nullable":true},"AnnualValueLoss":{"type":"number","nullable":true},"Periods":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Period-based valuation snapshot","properties":{"PeriodName":{"type":"string"},"StartDate":{"type":"string","format":"date","nullable":true},"EndDate":{"type":"string","format":"date","nullable":true},"StartingValue":{"type":"number","nullable":true},"EndingValue":{"type":"number","nullable":true},"Amount":{"type":"number","nullable":true}},"title":"AssetValuationPeriod"}}},"title":"AssetValuation"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer"}},"title":"AssetValuationResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"404":{"description":"Asset not found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
